mapper.select: SELECT * FROM devops_ci_pipeline_record dcpr WHERE dcpr.ci_pipeline_id = #{ciPipelineId} order by id desc

SELECT das.* FROM devops_ci_pipeline_record dpr LEFT JOIN devops_cicd_pipeline dcp ON dpr.ci_pipeline_id = dcp.id LEFT JOIN devops_app_service das ON dcp.app_service_id = das.id WHERE dpr.id = #{pipelineRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT * FROM devops_ci_pipeline_record dcpr left join devops_cicd_pipeline dcp on dcp.id = dcpr.ci_pipeline_id left join devops_app_service das on das.id = dcp.app_service_id WHERE das.external_config_id is null and (dcpr.status = 'pending' or dcpr.status = 'running') and dcpr.last_update_date < #{date}

SELECT dcpr.id, dcpr.ci_pipeline_id, dcpr.gitlab_pipeline_id, dcpr.commit_sha, dcpr.gitlab_trigger_ref, dcpr.status, dcpr.trigger_user_id, dcpr.created_date, dcpr.finished_date, dcpr.duration_seconds, dcpr.gitlab_project_id, dcp.name AS pipeline_name FROM devops_ci_pipeline_record dcpr JOIN devops_cicd_pipeline dcp ON dcp.id = dcpr.ci_pipeline_id WHERE dcpr.id = #{ciPipelineRecordId}

select dcpr.* from devops_ci_pipeline_record dcpr where dcpr.ci_pipeline_id = #{pipelineId}
AND dcpr.creation_date >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND dcpr.creation_date <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')
order by dcpr.creation_date DESC

select dcpr.* from devops_ci_pipeline_record dcpr where 1=1
AND dcpr.ci_pipeline_id in
#{pipelineId}
AND dcpr.creation_date >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND dcpr.creation_date <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')
order by dcpr.creation_date DESC
